OUTLINE : Patients receive pentamidine IV 2 hour 5 day week 2 week . Courses repeat every 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo tumor tissue blood sample collection periodically correlative laboratory study . Samples assess p53 status S100B , p53 , p21 expression immunohistochemistry , polymerase chain reaction , western blotting , luminescence assay , ELISA .
